content.text:

{| class="infobox" style="width: 25em; text-align: left; font-size: 70%; vertical-align: middle;"
|+ List of Matt Groening awards
|-
| colspan="2" style="text-align:center;" |
Groening at the 2009 San Diego Comic-Con
|- align="center"
!style="background:#cceecc; font-size:8pt;" width="60px"| Wins
!style="background:#eecccc; font-size:8pt;" width="60px"| Nominations
|- bgcolor=#eeeeff; align="center"
|
|
|}
